kpis.name: Competitor Count
kpis.description: Number of competitors identified and profiled
kpis.evidence: Identified 8 competitors: 5 Direct (Krave Mart, Foodpanda PandaMart, DealCart, Bazaar, GrocerApp), 2 Indirect (Daraz Mart, Yango+DealCart), 1 Adjacent (InDriver)

kpis.name: Coverage Quality
kpis.description: Percentage of competitors with complete 4-dimension profiles
kpis.evidence: All 8 competitors profiled across 4 dimensions: Company Overview, Target Customer, Solution Approach, Positioning. All profiles include sources and competitive analysis.

priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.name: Krave Mart
priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.rationale: Direct quick-commerce competitor, YC-backed, high customer switching intent, service reliability issues reported

priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.name: Foodpanda (PandaMart)
priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.rationale: Largest established player, dominant brand, high customer dissatisfaction, industry benchmark

priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.name: Daraz Mart
priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.rationale: Alibaba-backed market leader, 100% switching willingness from interviewed customers, must-win comparison

priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.name: Yango + DealCart
priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.rationale: Emerging super app threat, aggressive pricing, strong logistics capabilities

priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.name: InDriver
priority_competitors_for_gap_analysis.rationale: Adjacent competitor with grocery ambitions via Krave Mart investment, potential future threat
